message: Good explanation of counterintelligence for folks who are new to all this spy vs. spy stuff.

U.S. officials must not overlook counterintelligence mission, Inability of U.S. security officials to protect the nation's secrets, Wikileaks

‎"The counterintelligence function involves protecting the country, as well as intelligence agencies, from the activities of foreign intelligence services. The FBI has principal responsibility for countering the activities of foreign intelligence services within the US in order to protect both classified US Government information & proprietary information held by US industry."

http://canadafreepress.com/index.php/article/33661
